name: Neon Heist (GimmiBigMac)
description:
This is my game for the Game Make Amaze Me Game Jam!

A and D to move

Space to jump

Move mouse around player to control the Neon Saber

Enjoy!

All music, sound effects and art was made by me.

Programs:

Music - Bosca Ceoil

Sound Effects - bfxr

Art - Aseprite

Deflect opponents bullets with your very own Neon Saber! (Totally not a light saber)
